Header: Troops Clean Water-Cutting Spot at Getambe
Content: Troops of the Sri Lanka Army Elecrtrical and Mechanical Engineers (SLEME) Training School at Getambe conducted a Sharmadana campaign to clean the Diyakapanathota Viharaya, Getambe in Kandy ahead of the forthcoming Kandy Esela festival. Ten Other Rankers attended the Sharmadana. Major General Rukmal Dias, Commander, Security Forces - Central (SF-Cen) directed the troops for this meritorious project.
